title: Johnson Says Working on Plan to Quarantine Arrivals in U.K.
content:
1. Johnson Says Working on Plan to Quarantine Arrivals in U.K.  Bloomberg
  2. Boris Johnson 'Deeply Sorry' As U.K. Covid Toll Passes 100000 | NBC News NOW  NBC News
  3. 'I'm deeply sorry': Boris Johnson faces questions over UK Covid death toll  The Guardian
  4. U.K. to Bring in Hotel Quarantine for Highest-Risk Arrivals  Bloomberg
  5. Covid deaths: 'Hard to compute sorrow' of 100,000 milestone - PM  BBC News

localize.title: 约翰逊称正在制定计划，以检疫抵达英国的人。
約翰遜稱正在制定計劃，以檢疫抵達英國的人。
